mapper.select:
select id, name, sf_y, pic_type, model_name, model_index, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, create_user, create_user_id, create_date, status, update_date, update_user, remarks, audit_status from report_config where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and name like '%${name}%'
and sf_y like '%${sfY}%'
and pic_type like '%${picType}%'
and model_name like '%${modelName}%'
and model_index like '%${modelIndex}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_id like '%${createUserId}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and remarks like '%${remarks}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
